snippet: Investors were encouraged by news that the European Central Bank is ready to increase economic stimulus if inflation in the eurozone does not pick up.
abstract: Stocks rise modestly as markets calm in wake of turbulence.
lead_paragraph: Investors were encouraged by news that the European Central Bank is ready to increase economic stimulus if inflation in the eurozone does not pick up.

headline.main: Shares Edge Up as Global Turmoil Subsides
headline.print_headline: Shares Edge Up as Turmoil Subsides
